headline.main: Marathon Catlettsburg Refinery Workers OK New Pact
headline.print_headline: Marathon Catlettsburg Refinery Workers OK New Pact

docs.snippet: Hourly workers represented by the United Steelworkers union (USW) at Marathon Petroleum Corp's Catlettsburg, Kentucky, refinery voted on Friday to approve a new contract, ending a two-month work stoppage, a company spokesman said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hourly workers represented by the United Steelworkers union (USW) at Marathon Petroleum Corp's Catlettsburg, Kentucky, refinery voted on Friday to approve a new contract, ending a two-month work stoppage, a company spokesman said.

headline.main: Consumers Withdraw U.S. Lawsuit Against Google Over Android App Limits
headline.print_headline: Consumers Withdraw U.S. Lawsuit Against Google Over Android App Limits

docs.snippet: Plaintiffs in an antitrust lawsuit against Google Inc on Friday withdrew their case accusing the search engine company of harming smartphone buyers by forcing handset makers using Android operating system to make Google's own applications the defa...
docs.lead_paragraph: Plaintiffs in an antitrust lawsuit against Google Inc on Friday withdrew their case accusing the search engine company of harming smartphone buyers by forcing handset makers using Android operating system to make Google's own applications the default option.

headline.main: Stuckey Scores 15 to Lead Pacers Past Hornets 93-74
headline.print_headline: Stuckey Scores 15 to Lead Pacers Past Hornets 93-74

docs.snippet: Rodney Stuckey scored 15 points off the bench to lead the Indiana Pacers to a 93-74 victory over the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rodney Stuckey scored 15 points off the bench to lead the Indiana Pacers to a 93-74 victory over the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night.

headline.main: Chinese Police Detain 22 After Protest at Railway Station
headline.print_headline: Chinese Police Detain 22 After Protest at Railway Station

docs.snippet: Police in southern China have detained 22 people after demonstrators forced their way into a high-speed rail station in a protest about land and housing issues, state news agency Xinhua has said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in southern China have detained 22 people after demonstrators forced their way into a high-speed rail station in a protest about land and housing issues, state news agency Xinhua has said.

headline.main: Gortat and Beal Lead Wizards Past Knicks 101-87
headline.print_headline: Gortat and Beal Lead Wizards Past Knicks 101-87

docs.snippet: Marcin Gortat scored 19 points, Bradley Beal added 18, and the Washington Wizards defeated the New York Knicks 101-87 on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marcin Gortat scored 19 points, Bradley Beal added 18, and the Washington Wizards defeated the New York Knicks 101-87 on Friday night.

headline.main: New York Teenager Falls Off Building in Police Chase
headline.print_headline: New York Teenager Falls Off Building in Police Chase

docs.snippet: A 17-year-old boy was critically injured when he fell from the roof of a six-story New York apartment building as police attempted to question him over reports of marijuana smoking, police said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 17-year-old boy was critically injured when he fell from the roof of a six-story New York apartment building as police attempted to question him over reports of marijuana smoking, police said on Friday.

headline.main: China Says Iran Deal Good for Sino-U.S. Relations
headline.print_headline: China Says Iran Deal Good for Sino-U.S. Relations

docs.snippet: This week's framework nuclear deal with Iran was also good for boosting relations between China and the United States, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said in a call with U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry....
docs.lead_paragraph: This week's framework nuclear deal with Iran was also good for boosting relations between China and the United States, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said in a call with U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry.

headline.main: Procession of the Flagellants and the Crucified
headline.sub: Procession of the Flagellants and the Crucified

docs.snippet: Throngs of Catholic faithful descend on Mexico's colonial city of Taxco with whips and thorns for a graphic procession commemorating the crucifixion. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Throngs of Catholic faithful descend on Mexico's colonial city of Taxco with whips and thorns for a graphic procession commemorating the crucifixion. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

docs.snippet: HARRIS--Evelyn Sirotin, 95, died peacefully Friday, April 3. Beloved wife of Richard; mother of Peggy Plotnick, Lynn Harris, and Liz Schaeffer and husband, Peter; grandmother of Jennifer Backer and husband Gregg, Justin and Molly Schaeffer, and Me...
docs.lead_paragraph: HARRIS--Evelyn Sirotin, 95, died peacefully Friday, April 3. Beloved wife of Richard; mother of Peggy Plotnick, Lynn Harris, and Liz Schaeffer and husband, Peter; grandmother of Jennifer Backer and husband Gregg, Justin and Molly Schaeffer, and Megan and Ryan Hardiman; great-grandmother of Garrett and Nina Backer and Hannah Nocon. A life-long resident of Hackensack, NYU class of 1941, and lover of the arts.

docs.snippet: DISICK--Stuart. High Ridge Country Club acknowledges with sorrow the passing of our esteemed member, Stuart Disick. We extend our deepest sympathy to his beloved wife, Aileen, and their family. Stuart Albrecht, President Robert D. Lang, Secretary...
docs.lead_paragraph:
DISICK--Stuart.

High Ridge Country Club acknowledges with sorrow the passing of our esteemed member, Stuart Disick. We extend our deepest sympathy to his beloved wife, Aileen, and their family. Stuart Albrecht, President Robert D. Lang, Secretary
